info.name: Flask Shopping Cart API Final
info.description: A Flask application for managing a shopping cart.

item.name: Get details of a specific product.
Get an overview of all available products.
Add one or more products to the database.

item.name: Get the items in the shopping cart.
Add a product to the shopping cart.

response.name: Product added to the cart successfully.

item.name: Remove an entry from the shopping cart.
Update the quantity of a product in the cart.

request.description: This endpoint allows you to update the quantity of a product in the user's cart.

item.name: Place an order for the products in the shopping cart.
